review: I had visited for gynaecology related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was  waiting time when we went. It was for 20 minutes. Medicines was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Doctor was friendly.  Hospitality was good.

My wife had visited the hospital and it was health problem. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I can surely recommend doctor to others. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Tests was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Disappointed.
In my mothers case, first assurance was given to me in Chennai that the problem of SUI will be solved after surgery. So we went ahead for surgery in Chennai. But it didn't solve the problem. For the next one year we did follow ups with her in Guwahati taking all the medicines she prescribed but still there was no result. And after 1 year, she says to come back again to Chennai and do surgery again.
* ******* *** **** *** *** ********* *** **** *** ****** **** ** ************Not Recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Don't lose your hard earned money here. **** **** * **** ** *** **** ***** *****

Trusted the experience of Dr Meera Raghavan and reviews here. Visited the clinic to test for pregnancy. 

1. Doctor spoke for 2 mins and without giving me time to explain my situation,  started writing tests and medicine.
2. Did not ask me about my doubts or fears, no advise on precautions and how to care during pregnancy. 
3. Asked me to take a package of Rs. 5500 to confirm pregnancy.  It included blood tests and urine sample. PLEASE DON'T TAKE THIS PACKAGE..MONEY WASTED. ** *** **** **** **** ******** *** **** *** ** ** *** *** 
4. The main blood test which confirms the pregnancy is beta hcg test ***** *** ********* dr Meera did not suggest and instead wrote this expensive test ** **** *** ***** ****** *** ** *** ****** **** **** *** ** *********  
5. Really disappointed with myself that I trusted her and chose to go to her. 

** **** **********  * ***** ** ********* ** *** ****** ** ****** ******* ** ******* **** *********  ******** **** ** *** ****** *** *** *** ********** ***** **** * ********* *****

22 minutes agoNEW
Dr.Meera Raghavan is one of the professional doctor I have seen ,first I know dr.meera mam in my sister treatment for her first baby,by the advice, guidance, skill of dr.meera mam my sister got both baby's in normal delivery without going scissoring.. After that all of our family, friends many of them we refered to meera mam.. she have a highest successful rate of normal deliverys.. but it's only possible we follow what mam is saying.. ONE WORD to DR.MEERA RAGHAVAN is BELIEVE.. I keeps on Believe.. Hope you ALL.. But these things all possible only by FOLLOW UPS, appointments booking, suggestions, sincerity by NANCY MAM.. she is some one having a soul of Good Heart..she keeps on traveling with us for our Success..she is simply CARE..
Friendly and professional. I have found her diagnosis very good & correct - met her 4 times so far both at Chennai Speciality & now at Apollo* **** ******! Her experience does show up.
I have consulted nearly 7 doctors. I am satisfied with Dr. meera mam. I strongly believe her. Those who are out of chennai, please consult mam for pelvic floor problem.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. ************ *** **** ** *** ******. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation for 3 months. Doctor checked reports. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor told not to lift weight. She spoke well. We have plans to go again in July month for follow-up.
Go for online consultation if you are traveling from long distance . She just says the cause offline . She doesn't even examine you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Affordable fees. She prescribes only the necessary tests and medicines and diagnoses well. She also speaks in a kind manner and listens to our queries and answers them patiently.
